items.sentence: After the hatchet job my boss did on my proposal, I'm not sure how long I want to keep on working here.
Tom felt the stiffness in his joints as he stood up after sitting in the same position for a long time.
Tom was a stay-at-home dad; he took care of the children while his wife finished her surgical training.
Caffeine is a purinergic antagonist that competitively inhibits adenosine at the sites of P1 receptors.
Since the traffic lights weren't working, there were policemen directing traffic at every intersection.
Tom doesn\'t like being around children because he\'s always afraid of catching a cold from one of them.
Tom was glad that he\'d bought a bottle of wine with a screw cap, since he couldn\'t find his corkscrew.
If Tom would learn to be a little more positive about things, people would probably like him a bit more.
Mary asked Tom what he thought of her dress, but he knew better than to tell her what he really thought.
Tom thinks he knows how much money Mary makes, but Mary makes quite a bit more than Tom thinks she does.
